[[9,12],[1,10],[4,11],[8,12],[3,9],[6,9],[6,7]]

here the sorted order will be :

here on the second iteration, 
 small = 10 but the CurrNode = { 3 , 9 } 
 So, CurrNode[1] >= small  BUT  here CurrNode[1] < small, hence to obey the rule:  we will change small from 10 to 9 and 
 1 <= 9 <= 10
